Constructor Detail

Font

public Font(Font.Family fontFamily)
Creates an instance of the font with given font family. Font style is set to Font.Plain, font size is set to zero. Font size of zero means that size is not set.

Font

public Font(Font.Family fontFamily,
            int fontStyle,
            int fontSize)
Creates an instance of the font with given font family, style and size. Font family can be Font.Serif, Font.SansSerif, Font.Cursive, Font.Fantasy and Font.Monospace. Font style can be Font.Plain, Font.Italic, Font.Bold or bitwised combination of Font.Italic and Font.Bold, i.e. Font.Italic|Font.Bold. Font size of zero means that size is not set.
